extendedInfo.description: This is the Ad-Free version of our "Portrait Sketch" app."Portrait Sketch" is able to create nice and clear sketch on human faces with just one button click. With the user-friendly UI design, you can become a sketch artist by just one tap from this app! You can pick a picture from your gallery or capture one from your camera to generate the sketch. Both black-white and color sketch results can be easily created. Sharing pics are also supported in the app. They can be shared from Facebook, Twitter, E-mail, Message, etc. Various photo effects are also built-in.Keywords: portrait sketch, sketch free, pencil sketch, paper sketch, sketch camera, cartoon photo.
